targets.expr: (sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend", code="1xx"}))/ sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend"})) * 100) + (sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend", code="2xx"}))/ sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend"})) * 100) + (sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend", code="3xx"}))/ sum (rate(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{dns_hostname=~"$dns_hostname", proxy=~"$backend"})) * 100)
